name: Avoid using obsolete "Arithmetic Operations" Statement in RPG Programs (RPG-IV only)  (RPG400)
description: This rule searches all the programs having obsolete "Arithmetic Operations" statements.
output:
This report lists RPG400 programs using obsolete "Arithmetic Operations" Statement in RPG Programs (RPG-IV only).
It provides the following information:
RPG400 Program full name
rationale: During the upgrade of the different RPG versions (V2 / V3 / ILE V4) some statements are no longer supported. Where ever in the code these statements the artifact is reported as a violation.
remediation: Try to replace these statements with some other non obsolete.
remediationSample: Use free format equivalent of bit operations as described in https://publib.boulder.ibm.com/iseries/v5r2/ic2924/books/c092508427.htm#HDREEARITH
sample: You can view the usage of operators on https://publib.boulder.ibm.com/iseries/v5r2/ic2924/books/c092508427.htm#HDRAROPER
alternativeName: Avoid using obsolete "Arithmetic Operations" Statement in RPG Programs (RPG-IV only)  (RPG400)
